data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are plenty of behaviors that other people annoy me with in my daily life and I would like to give some specific illustrations. First of all, I will feel upset when someone speaks very loudly in any public place such as shopping malls or the subway. In my view, it is really a kind of rude behavior. Secondly, I will also feel extremely angry when my schedule is changed by some accident issues. The reason is that it will bring some inconvenience to my daily life. Last but not least, it is also annoying about interpreting my conversation or presentation. All in all, these are some behaviors that other people annoy me.
data.referenceText: What kind of behavior in other people annoys you?
data.referenceTranslate: 别人的什么行为会惹恼你?
